name: Villa Anzola
description: A bespoke architectural retreat in Lehigh Acres, Florida. This refined tropical home pairs natural textures with contemporary lines and generous outdoor living, offering an exclusive experience where every detail is crafted for distinction, comfort, and timeless sophistication.

name: Villa Maria
description: A serene tropical modern retreat in Lehigh Acres. Villa Maria blends natural textures, warm wood accents, and matte black architecture with lush outdoor living around a private pool. Refined interiors, a chef kitchen, spa like baths, and a pergola lounge deliver timeless comfort and quiet sophistication.

name: Villa Dorticos
description: A waterfront retreat in Punta Gorda where bold geometry meets organic softness. A dark and elegant exterior pairs with warm wood and lush greenery, opening to expansive layouts with double height light, warm tones, and curated illumination. Terraced gardens, a pool terrace, and a private dock create a seamless connection to nature, delivering refined comfort and timeless sophistication.

name: Villa Oceania
description: A waterfront tropical modern residence in Punta Gorda. Villa Oceania pairs sculpted rooflines, matte dark stucco, and warm wood with generous glass and lush gardens, opening to elegant interiors with soft lighting, a chef kitchen, and spa baths. A long waterfront terrace with pool, lounge areas, and a dock frames sweeping water views and delivers a calm, refined lifestyle with timeless sophistication.

name: Villa Oasis
description: A waterfront tropical modern residence in Florida. Dark stucco and warm wood pair with generous glass and clean roof lines, opening to serene interiors with an open kitchen, spa baths, and curated lighting. A pool terrace, lounge deck, and a private dock deliver calm living with timeless sophistication.

name: Villa Nacho
description: A tropical modern residence in Lehigh Acres. Villa Nacho blends matte dark stucco, warm wood screens, and crisp geometry with lush landscaping. Bright interiors with clerestory light, an open chef kitchen, and spa baths flow to a private pool terrace, delivering refined comfort, privacy, and timeless sophistication.

name: Villa Valeria
description: A contemporary sanctuary in Miami where refined minimalism meets organic warmth. Clean geometry, textured stucco, and vertical wood screens frame light filled interiors that flow to a private courtyard with pool, pergola lounge, and garden. Calm palettes, curated lighting, and crafted details elevate daily living and create a timeless sense of harmony.

name: Villa Barranquilla
description: A contemporary retreat in Miami that pairs textured stucco, vertical wood screens, and generous glass with lush greenery. Bold lines and warm natural tones shape calm interiors where open layouts, crafted millwork, and soft lighting flow to a private patio with pool and lounge. The result is refined comfort and modern elegance in perfect balance.

name: Villa Santa Marta
description: A modern sanctuary in Miami that blends bold geometry with natural warmth. A concrete facade with wood screens sits within lush gardens and generous glazing. Inside, open spaces with marble finishes and natural wood tones gather daylight and flow to a private pool deck and an upper terrace, delivering refined comfort, function, and a calm connection to nature.

name: Villa Cartagena
description: A contemporary refuge in Miami that unites refined architecture with tropical nature. A tall glass volume wrapped in warm wood screens anchors the facade, bringing lush greenery into calm, light filled interiors. Open living areas with a chef kitchen and spa baths flow to a private garden with pool and lounge, delivering a serene and sophisticated way of life.

name: Villa Guajira
description: Villa Guajira is a modern duplex in Miami, offering clean lines, warm textures, and tropical landscaping. Its design blends indoor-outdoor living with private pools, luxurious interiors, and a serene, contemporary ambiance. Perfect for elegant urban lifestyles.

name: Villa Ochoa
description: Villa Ochoa pairs minimalist architecture with natural warmth. A low, linear façade in stone-gray stucco and vertical wood screens sits within lush greenery, while expansive glazing and clerestory windows bathe the interiors in soft Florida light. Inside, an open plan wrapped in creamy plaster, marble accents, and custom millwork drifts out to the covered terrace, pool, and private dock—an effortless balance of modern design and serene living.

name: Villa Don Quixote
address: 2861 Don Quixote Dr, Punta Gorda, FL 33950
description: Villa Don Quixote blends modern elegance with a serene outdoor retreat. A bold façade of clean lines and warm, earthy textures pairs with lush greenery. Inside, open layouts and soft, layered lighting create effortless comfort, while the poolside lounge invites relaxation—striking a refined balance between sophistication and tranquility.

name: Villa Atlantico
description: This modern home harmonizes with its natural surroundings through a minimalist exterior, clean lines, and earthy tones. Wooden accents and dark textures add elegance while blending with the lush greenery. Inside, neutral palettes, natural materials like wood and stone, and an open-plan layout maximize light and comfort. Floor-to-ceiling curtains and indoor greenery enhance the connection to nature, creating a tranquil and balanced space for relaxation.

name: Villa Nukes
description: A modern sanctuary in Lehigh Acres that pairs calm sophistication with natural elegance. Clean geometry, warm woods, and an earthy palette frame bright, open-plan living that flows to a sunlit pool terrace. With four bedrooms, three baths, and lush privacy, it’s designed for effortless indoor-outdoor relaxation.

name: Villa Esplanade
description: A serene, single-story residence that pairs coastal calm with contemporary minimalism. Rhythmic wood screens, low horizontal lines, and generous glazing frame sculpted gardens and soften the façade. Inside, a clerestory-lit great room centers a chef’s kitchen with a monolithic island, while spa-like suites feature rich stone and warm veneers. Seamless indoor-outdoor flow leads to landscaped terraces and pool—elegance made effortless.

name: Villa Penate
description: Villa Penate is a refined one-story residence that balances crisp geometry with warm, tactile finishes. A moody façade with wood accents and expansive glazing leads to light-filled interiors chef’s kitchen, lofted living, and spa suites that unfold to a pool terrace and waterfront dock, creating seamless, resort-style indoor–outdoor living.

name: Villa Victor
description: Villa Victor blends sleek architecture with tropical serenity. Its dark exterior contrasts with warm wood accents, creating a bold, modern look. Inside, open living spaces and natural light define a refined lifestyle, while the private pool deck offers an inviting escape—designed for both relaxation and entertaining.

name: Villa Tortuga
address: 3736 Turtle Dove Blvd, Punta Gorda, FL 33950
description: Villa Tortuga pairs a low, modern profile with warm wood accents and soft lighting, set among palms for a relaxed streetscape. Inside, airy rooms and a lofty kitchen–dining space use pale oak, stone, and matte black details for quiet sophistication, while calm bedrooms and a spa-like bath open to a pool terrace made for easy coastal living.

name: Villa JH II
description: A contemporary residence organized around a central pool courtyard that blends modern minimalism with tropical warmth. The front façade combines soft textures, dark tones, and vertical wood detailing, setting a refined yet inviting tone. Inside, a seamless open plan connects the living, dining, and chef’s kitchen, anchored by fluted wood, natural stone, and curated lighting.The primary suite enjoys direct pool views, a spa-inspired bath, and a custom walk-in closet. Five additional bedrooms are distributed for privacy, each designed with large windows and access to natural light. The outdoor terrace expands the living space, featuring a covered lounge, summer kitchen, and expansive pool deck surrounded by lush greenery—ideal for relaxed living and sophisticated entertaining.

name: DDC Wellness Center
areas_info: 70 Smart Homes • Wellness Center with gym, green areas, and health clinic
description: A wellness driven residential master plan that brings together 70 smart homes and a state of the art health and fitness center. The community is delivered with DfMA and modular construction in cold formed steel, fully coordinated in BIM for accuracy, quality control, and accelerated schedules. Homes are net zero ready with high performance envelopes, low U value glazing, continuous insulation, energy recovery ventilation, efficient HVAC, and heat pump water heating. The project includes distributed photovoltaics, readiness for battery storage, EV charging, and a community energy management system. Biocentric landscape design provides shade, green corridors, stormwater capture, and efficient irrigation. Native home automation enables app based control of lighting, climate, and security, plus indoor air quality sensors. The Wellness Center features a gym, studios for classes, therapy rooms, and consultation suites, with acoustic design and circadian lighting to maximize comfort, health, and productivity.

name: Villa Ciego de Avila
description: A single-story modern retreat that pairs dark stucco with warm wood slats and natural stone for a refined, understated presence. A deep entry porch leads to an open living area with lofty ceilings, clerestory light, and custom millwork. The kitchen features a sculpted marble island, vertical wood paneling, and clean lines that integrate dining and family spaces.The primary suite opens to the terrace and includes a spa-style bath; three secondary bedrooms form a private wing with two full bathrooms. Outdoors, a perimeter deck and linear pool shape a resortlike setting framed by tropical landscaping and low lighting—ideal for effortless entertaining and everyday relaxation. Warm minimalism, designed for seamless indoor-outdoor living.

name: Villa Gabriel
description: A contemporary estate with classical poise. The arrival sequence is defined by a soaring, double-height portico wrapped in warm vertical wood and soft arch lighting, setting a calm, elegant tone. Inside, an open great room flows to the dining area and chef’s kitchen with sculpted stone surfaces, fluted wood detailing, and custom millwork. The primary suite is a private retreat with a spa-style bath and tailored dressing room, while three secondary suites are organized for privacy. Large sliders open to a resortlike pool terrace lined with rhythmic columns, lounge areas, and lush landscaping, perfect for effortless entertaining and everyday serenity.

name: Villa Tropical Oasis
description: Villa Tropical Oasis extends its warm minimalism to the outdoors, merging sleek architecture with a lush tropical setting. A dark stucco and natural wood facade with deep eaves frames the entry court of palms and stone, creating a calm, modern arrival. Floor to ceiling windows open the great room to a terraced ipe deck with cable rail, lounge and dining zones, and a hammock nook that overlooks a sculpted pool edged in natural rock and layered planting.The grounds live like a private club. A turf sports lawn accommodates soccer and a basketball key for daily play, while discreet landscape lighting and dense greenery ensure privacy and a resort mood in the evening. Together with the serene interiors, the home delivers a refined indoor outdoor lifestyle designed for relaxation, wellness, and effortless entertaining.

name: Villa Perez
description: A sleek one-story residence that balances bold lines with warm, natural finishes. The arrival court features a deep floating canopy, sculpted landscaping, and a refined entry framed in vertical slats. Inside, the great room flows to a dramatic chef’s kitchen with dark stone, a fluted wood island, and soaring clerestory light, then to a generous dining area. Oversized sliders open to a resort-style pool terrace with wide decking, lounge zones, and soft landscape lighting, ideal for effortless indoor-outdoor living. The primary suite includes a spa bath and custom wardrobe, while three secondary suites are set along a private wing for quiet comfort.
